childMarkdownRemark.html:
Welcome,

My name is Jasper van Rijbroek, a professional (senior) developer, hobbist home automator and father.

When I blog I blog about things I find interesting in my life or which I think is worth mentioning.

Currently my interests lay in Smart Home, Gatsby, Gaming and Servers.

About the website itself

The stack that I am using for this website is Gatsby, TailwindCSS, Algolia and Contentful to display all the content of the website (read more).
